com.ibm.jaggr.core.cache

Interface ICacheManagerListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JsxResourceConverter

    public interface ICacheManagerListener
    OSGi service listener interface that is called by the cache manager when it has been initialized. Aggregator extension may register service listeners for this interface to know when it is safe to call cache manager methods for adding named caches, etc. To receive listener events, register the implementing class as an OSGi service, specifying the servlet name in the name service property.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void initialized(ICacheManager cacheManager)
      Called when the cache manager has been initialized.
